meanings.definition: to point or direct (a weapon or camera) at a target
meanings.sent1: She aimed the toy gun at the target.
meanings.sent2: The archer aimed carefully before releasing the arrow.
meanings.sent3: The cat aimed its laser pointer at the wall, entertaining itself.
meanings.sent4: His words aimed straight at her heart, leaving her speechless.
meanings.sent5: The detective aimed his flashlight into the dark alley, searching for clues.

meanings.sent1: Her aim in life is to become a teacher.
meanings.sent2: His aim was to make his parents proud.
meanings.sent3: The aim of the game is to collect the most points.
meanings.sent4: Love became his guiding aim in life, leading him to happiness.
meanings.sent5: The aim of the project is to improve community health through education.

meanings.definition: to strive or work towards a goal
meanings.sent1: They aimed to finish the race in under an hour.
meanings.sent2: She aimed for a promotion by working hard every day.
meanings.sent3: The team aimed for victory, practicing tirelessly.
meanings.sent4: His efforts aimed at creating a better future for his children.
meanings.sent5: The students aimed to excel in their exams through dedicated study.
